com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Interface UserGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDto, java.security.acl.Group, java.security.Principal, ReferableDto, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManager.UserGroupImpl

    public interface UserGroup
extends ReferableDto, java.security.acl.Group
    The management interface of a CodeBeamer user group

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(EntityPermission<UserDto>... permission)
        Check if this user group grants any of the specified permissions
        Parameters:
        permission - is a variable argument list of user permissions to check
        Returns:
        true if this user group role grants any of the specified permissions, false otherwise

      • getPermissions

        Get the group permissions
